author: Erik Schultz
subject: Some sad news.
body:
The voice actor Kaneto Siozawa has passed away.  He did the voice for
Goemon in The Fuma Conspiracy, as well as a large number of other
roles.  You can read all about it at
http://news.yahoo.co.jp/headlines/jij/000510/dom/18585501_jijdomx185.html,
if you can read japanese...
